name: Liber Prologue
description:
The liber prologue tells us the backstory of Nick Rhodes' life in the wild west before the connection with a mysterious book that will completely turn his life upside down. You'll be part of a tense western with a gray morality where everyone is willing to trade friends and conscience for a coin and a bottle of whiskey. In this rugged world of the wild west you should learn just one rule.
He who does not know fear
God is not the judge
And the sheriff is not the law.
Waiting for you:
- Exploring the picturesque locations of the Wild Zakapa
- Stories and acquaintances with colorful characters
- One-on-one speed duels
- Shootouts, chases
- Riding a horse
